item.description:
Games day is a day long event where games of all types will be played.

There is a $3 pre registration fee. After November 1st the price for the event is $5.00 at the door.

Many different games will be played during the day and include: Board Games, Card Games, and Role Playing Games!

This is an All Ages event! Children ages 10 and under must be accompanied by an adult while they are at the event. Adults accompanying children will be provided free admission.

You must complete the Games Day Registration forms attend!! ( available at New Heights or Jumpgate)

There will be multiple gaming sessions with a 1-hour lunch break in the middle of the day. You?re on your own for lunch!

Feel free to bring a game along that you would like to play. There will be Open Gaming Tables available for you to gather players and play!

Games that may be played.

? Apples to Apples
? Dungeons & Dragons RPG
? Magic the Gathering
? Buffy RPG
? Star Wars Minis
? Twilight Imperium
? Wizards of the Coast Demos
? Unique Board & Card Games
? And MORE!!

Note: Games are subject to change.
This is only some of the games that will be played!


I hope that all of you are able to make this great event! Please bring your friends if you are planning to bring a large group please contact me for possible group discounts.

GAME MASTERS NEEDED
For Future Events!

As we continue to plan these sorts of events we always need people to run games!
If you would like to run a game at this event or a future event please E-mail Wayne@sagesofrpg.com



Click here for info on Games Day!

group.name: The Portsmouth, NH / Seacoast Boardgames Group

item.name: Portsmouth Community Games Day!
